title: GREEN EGGS AND HAMRelated Nigella RecipesRelated Community Recipes
directions: Blend or whisk together the pesto, egg, flour and milk to make a batter.
Oil a crepe pan or heavy-based frying pan, wiping away any excess oil with some kitchen paper, and place over a medium heat.
Ladle in approximately 100ml / ½ cup of batter, swirling instantly to gain a paper-thin crepe.
Once the top becomes dry and the edges lift away, flick it over with a thin rubber or wooden spatula to cook the other side for about 30 seconds.

Layer the pancakes between pieces of baking parchment or greaseproof paper as you go, and when you have finished making them, lay a slice of ham on each one and roll up or fold into triangles - or however you like!
